# Hubql

> Product-focused software studio building modern web applications, APIs, and intelligent automation systems for startups and fast-moving companies.

## Overview

Hubql is a software development agency specializing in building intelligent software solutions for startups, fast-moving companies, and product-focused teams. We help bring visions to life through modern web applications, APIs, collaborative platforms, and intelligent automation systems - crafted with care, focus, and creativity.

## Services

### Collaborative Web Applications

From dashboards to multiplayer workspaces - we design and build web apps that support real-time collaboration, rich data, and custom workflows.

**Deliverables:**
- Real-time collaborative platforms and dashboards
- Custom workflow management systems
- Data-rich interactive applications
- Multiplayer workspaces and team tools

Learn more: [Collaborative Web Applications](https://www.hubql.com/collaborative-web-application)

### Visual & 3D Web Applications

We design immersive product interfaces - from 2D dashboards to WebGL-powered 3D tools. Ideal for configurators, industrial visualization, or rich design systems.

**Deliverables:**
- WebGL-powered 3D visualizations
- Product configurators and customization tools
- Industrial visualization platforms
- Interactive design systems and rich interfaces

Learn more: [3D Web Applications](https://www.hubql.com/3d-web-application)

### APIs & Documentation

We build fast, well-documented APIs and internal platforms that keep teams efficient - perfect for scaling startups or process-heavy SMEs.

**Deliverables:**
- Custom RESTful and GraphQL API development
- Automated API documentation systems
- Internal developer platforms
- Third-party API integrations

Learn more: [APIs & Documentation](https://www.hubql.com/apis)

### Intelligent Automation Systems

We craft intelligent automation systems that streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance productivity through workflow orchestration and smart integrations.

**Deliverables:**
- Workflow automation and orchestration with n8n
- Business process automation
- API integrations and data transformations
- Event-driven automation systems

Learn more: [Intelligent Automation Systems](https://www.hubql.com/intelligent-automation-systems)

### Web Design

We create user-centered digital experiences that blend functionality with aesthetics. From wireframes to final UI/UX, we ensure that your product is intuitive and engaging.

**Deliverables:**
- End-to-end UI/UX design for web applications
- Wireframing and interactive prototyping
- Design systems and component libraries
- User research and usability testing

Learn more: [Web Design](https://www.hubql.com/web-design)

### Supabase MVPs

We help early-stage teams launch fast using Supabase as the foundation. From schema planning to production-ready frontends - sprint delivery, zero fluff.

**Deliverables:**
- Rapid MVP development with Supabase
- PostgreSQL database schema design
- Authentication and authorization setup
- Production-ready full-stack applications

Learn more: [Supabase MVP Development](https://www.hubql.com/supabase-mvp)

## Portfolio & Case Studies

### Fintech Dashboard
Fintech trading dashboard to manage trading bots.
- Technologies: React, Supabase, Next.js, Custom Design
- Comprehensive trading management platform

### Schema Visualizer
SaaS tool marketing website and visualization platform.
- URL: [schemavisualizer.dev](https://www.schemavisualizer.dev/)
- Technologies: React, XY Flow, Node.js, Supabase, AWS
- Full-featured data visualization SaaS product

### Hoot - Job Portal
Job portal & dashboard for schools.
- URL: [hoot.org.uk](https://www.hoot.org.uk/)
- Technologies: React, Tailwind CSS, Custom Design
- Complete job management system for educational institutions

### RConnect
Developer marketing website.
- URL: [rconnect.tech](https://www.rconnect.tech/)
- Technologies: React, Next.js, Web Design
- Modern developer-focused marketing site

### APIPT
Devtool landing page and marketing website.
- URL: [apipt.dev](https://www.apipt.dev/)
- Technologies: React, Next.js, Web Design
- Developer tool product website

### Synci
Two-way sync for Airtable and Webflow.
- Technologies: React, Next.js, Web Design
- Integration platform for no-code tools

## Technology Stack

### Frontend & Design
- **Figma**: Collaborative design, prototyping, component libraries, design systems
- **React**: Component-based UI architecture, modern patterns, Next.js integration
- **Next.js**: Server-side rendering, static generation, App/Pages Router
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first styling, responsive design, custom design systems
- **Framer Motion**: Animations and interactive UI elements
- **TypeScript**: Type-safe development across the stack

### Backend & Infrastructure
- **Node.js**: Backend runtime for scalable server-side applications
- **Supabase**: PostgreSQL database, authentication, real-time subscriptions, storage
- **AWS**: Cloud hosting, serverless architecture, managed services, CloudFront CDN
- **Cloudflare**: Global CDN, DDoS protection, edge optimization, Workers deployment

### Automation & Integration
- **n8n**: Workflow automation, API orchestration, self-hosted integrations
- **Zapier**: No-code integrations and automated workflows
- **Airtable**: Flexible databases, project management, custom views

### Development & Deployment
- **Git & GitHub**: Version control and collaboration
- **TinaCMS**: Content management system
- **OpenNext for Cloudflare**: Next.js deployment to Cloudflare Workers
- **PostHog & Koala**: Analytics and user tracking

- [Privacy Policy](https://www.hubql.com/privacy-policy): Privacy policy

## Target Clients

- **Startups**: Early-stage teams needing rapid MVP development and product validation
- **Fast-Moving Companies**: Organizations requiring quick iterations and scalable solutions
- **Product Teams**: Teams building collaborative platforms and data-rich applications
- **SMEs**: Small to medium enterprises needing process automation and custom tools
- **Founders**: Entrepreneurs bringing new product ideas to life
- **Educational Institutions**: Schools and organizations needing custom portals and tools

## Technical Capabilities

### Frontend Development
- Server-side rendering and static site generation with Next.js
- Component-based architecture with React 19
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Interactive animations with Framer Motion
- 3D graphics with Spline and WebGL
- Dark mode and theming support

### Backend Development
- RESTful and GraphQL API development
- Real-time data with Supabase subscriptions
- Authentication and authorization systems
- File storage and CDN integration
- Serverless functions and edge computing

### Automation & Integration
- Workflow automation with n8n and Zapier
- Third-party API integrations
- Data synchronization across platforms (Airtable, Webflow)
- Event-driven architectures
- Scheduled tasks and background jobs

### Design & UX
- User-centered design methodology
- Wireframing and prototyping in Figma
- Design systems and component libraries
- Accessibility and performance optimization
- Responsive and mobile-first design

## Infrastructure

- **Hosting**: Cloudflare Workers (production), AWS (services)
- **CDN**: Cloudflare global network
- **Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- **Content**: TinaCMS cloud
- **Analytics**: PostHog, Koala
- **Security**: Turnstile CAPTCHA, DDoS protection

## Partnership

Hubql partners with GROWSaaS for growth and marketing services, offering comprehensive solutions from product development to market launch in the DACH region and beyond.
